member.name: GetBatchDetectionResultAsync(string,global::System.Threading.CancellationToken)
GetBatchDetectionResult(string,global::System.Threading.CancellationToken)
GetBatchDetectionResultAsync(string,global::Azure.RequestContext)
member.remarks:
For asynchronous inference, get multivariate anomaly detection result based on resultId returned by the BatchDetectAnomaly api.
Below is the JSON schema for the response payload.
Response Body:
Schema for DetectionResult: { resultId: string, # Required. Result identifier, which is used to fetch the results of an inference call. }
